description:
Terao Noboru is a classmate of Nagamine Mikako in the third year of her junior high school and part of the kendo team.
When the Lysithea leaves Earth to search for the Tarsians with Mikako on board, he remains behind and enters senior high school. The couple continues to communicate across interplanetary, and eventually interstellar space via the e-mail facilities on their mobile phones.
Years later after receiving Mikako`s last mail he eventually decides to go after her into space.
name: Terao Noboru
